extract_embedding.description: Use Uni-RNA's pre-trained weights to efficiently characterize sequences. Input a nucleic acid sequence and obtain the corresponding feature vector, which can be used for a series of downstream analyses.

rna_ss.description: Use the fine-tuned Uni-RNA to accurately predict the secondary structure of RNA sequences. We provide two fine-tuned versions to choose from, one based on the Uni-RNA self-built dataset and the other based on the RNAStralign dataset.

utr.page_name: mRNA 5'UTR mean ribosome load (MRL) prediction tool
utr.description: Use the fine-tuned Uni-RNA to accurately predict the mean ribosome load of the 5'UTR region of the mRNA sequence.

apa.description: Use the fine-tuned Uni-RNA to accurately predict alternative polyadenylation events in the 3'UTR region of mRNA sequences.

m6a.page_name: RNA m6A modification site prediction tool
m6a.description: Use the fine-tuned Uni-RNA to accurately predict the modification probability of the adenosine at the central position of the sequence

lncrna_sublocalization.page_name: Long non-coding RNA subcellular localization prediction tool
lncrna_sublocalization.description: Use the fine-tuned Uni-RNA to accurately predict the subcellular localization of long non-coding RNA.

drugrank.page_name: Affinity screening tool for RNA-targeting small molecules
drugrank.description: Given the sequence of the RNA target and the small molecule library to be screened, use the fine-tuned Uni-RNA mode to screen out the small molecule with the strongest binding ability to RNA.
